title: New: Ecstasy – Teenage Coma
body:
Elusive London synth-pop outfit **Ecstasy** are rapidly proving their ability to pen arena filling, M83 style tracks, sure to prompt a flurry of A&R’s whipping out their blank cheque-books (this doesn’t happen anymore… much).

_Teenage Coma_ is perhaps their most ambitious number to date, seemingly drawing from more clearly American influences than previous tracks. It’s sickly sweet, but boy is it absolutely fantastic.

_‘I’ll stay by your bed for tonight, in the comatose light’_
